title: INEKE VAN'T SPIJKER lectures at the Universities of Groningen and Utrecht. Her publications include Als door een speciaal Stempel
She published on late-medieval historiography and hagiography, among which Historiography and Humanism in Holland in the Age of Erasmus: Aurelius and the Divisiekroniek of 1517
